subject: Gate admin pages before fetching
description: Admin pages call fetchWithAuth and load data even when user is not admin, then redirect to /chat; this can trigger 403s/flash for non-admins. Add role guard before loadUsers/loadStats or short-circuit effects. Files: packages/web/src/app/(dashboard)/admin/users/page.tsx:29-59, packages/web/src/app/(dashboard)/admin/stats/page.tsx:51-75.
